activate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to make an electrical system or chemical process start working
activate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Cooking fumes may activate the alarm.
The yeastâ€™s growth is activated by sugar and warmth.
activate.translation[0].note_box[0].item: In everyday English, people usually use set off rather than activate when talking about electrical systems:
Someone has set off the smoke alarm again.
